def_cn: 相互补充的;相辅相成的
def_en: Complementary things are different from each other but make a good combination.

def_cn: 补充医学的(不同于西医的治疗方法，如针灸、顺势疗法)
def_en: Complementary medicine refers to ways of treating patients which are different from the ones used by most Western doctors, for example acupuncture and homoeopathy.
